Class Deadline

java.lang.Object
  Deadline

public class Deadline
extends Object

This class models a deadline which represents a date. .

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dr A J Beaumont

Constructor Detail

Deadline

public Deadline()
Construct a new deadline. By default, deadlines are one week ahead of the time now.

hasPassed

public boolean hasPassed()
Find out if this deadline has passed.

Returns:
true when the time now is later than the deadline.

setNewDeadline

public void setNewDeadline(int numDays)
Change the date of this deadline by a specified number of days.

Parameters:
numDays - the number of days to add to the deadline date (may be negative).
